mapper.select: select * from costView where companyCode = #{companyCode} order by day
select * from costView where day like #{year} || '%' and companyCode = #{companyCode} order by day

select round(sum(salesAmount)/10000, 0) salesAmount, month, year from (select salesAmount, substr(day, 4, 2) month, substr(day, 1, 2) year from salesView where substr(day, 1, 2) = #{year} and companyCode = #{companyCode}) group by month, year order by month

select round(sum(salesAmount)/10000, 0) refundAmount, month, year from (select salesAmount, substr(day, 4, 2) month, substr(day, 1, 2) year from refundView where substr(day, 1, 2) = #{year} and companyCode = #{companyCode}) group by month, year order by month

select round(sum(costAmount)/10000, 0) costAmount, month, year from (select costAmount, substr(day, 4, 2) month, substr(day, 1, 2) year from costView where substr(day, 1, 2) = #{year} and companyCode = #{companyCode}) group by month, year order by month
select round(sum(salesAmount)/10000, 0) salesAmount, year from (select salesAmount, substr(day, 1, 2) year from salesView where companyCode = #{companyCode}) group by year order by year
select round(sum(salesAmount)/10000, 0) refundAmount, year from (select salesAmount, substr(day, 1, 2) year from refundView where companyCode = #{companyCode}) group by year order by year
select round(sum(costAmount)/10000, 0) costAmount, year from (select costAmount, substr(day, 1, 2) year from costView where companyCode = #{companyCode}) group by year order by year

select round(sum(salesAmount)/10000, 0) salesAmount, payType, year from (select salesAmount, substr(day, 1, 2) year, payType from salesView where companyCode = #{companyCode}) where year = #{year} group by payType, year order by year

select round(sum(salesAmount)/10000, 0) refundAmount, payType, year from (select salesAmount, substr(day, 1, 2) year, payType from refundView where companyCode = #{companyCode}) where year = #{year} group by payType, year order by year

select round(sum(salesAmount)/10000, 0) salesAmount, payType, year, month from (select salesAmount, substr(day, 1, 2) year, substr(day, 4, 2) month, payType from salesView where companyCode = #{companyCode}) where year = #{year} and month = #{month} group by payType, year, month order by year

select round(sum(salesAmount)/10000, 0) refundAmount, payType, year, month from (select salesAmount, substr(day, 1, 2) year, substr(day, 4, 2) month, payType from refundView where companyCode = #{companyCode}) where year = #{year} and month = #{month} group by year, payType, month order by year

SELECT sum(salesAmount) salesAmount, SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1)) LCATEGORY FROM SALESVIEW where day like #{date} || '%' and companyCode = #{companyCode} group by SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1))

SELECT sum(salesAmount) refundAmount, SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1)) LCATEGORY FROM refundVIEW where day like #{date} || '%' and companyCode = #{companyCode} group by SUBSTR(CATEGORYNAME,INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1, INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,2)-(INSTR(CATEGORYNAME,'/',1,1)+1))

select round(sum(endBalance)/10000, 0) endBalance, substr(day, 1, 2) year, substr(day, 4, 2) month from depositView where (depositAccountCode, day, substr(day, 1, 2), substr(day, 4, 2)) in (select depositAccountCode, max(day) day, substr(day, 1, 2) year, substr(day, 4, 2) month from depositview where companyCode = #{companyCode} and day like #{year} || '%' group by depositAccountcode, substr(day, 1, 2), substr(day, 4, 2)) group by substr(day, 1, 2), substr(day, 4, 2) order by year, month

select round(sum(loansBalance)/10000, 0) loansBalance, substr(loans_repaymentday, 1, 2) year, substr(loans_repaymentday, 4, 2) month from loansView where (loansAccountCode, loans_repaymentday, substr(loans_repaymentday, 1, 2), substr(loans_repaymentday, 4, 2)) in (select loansAccountCode, max(loans_repaymentDay) day, substr(loans_repaymentday, 1, 2) year, substr(loans_repaymentday, 4, 2) month from loansView where loans_repaymentday like #{year} || '%' and loans_companyCode = #{companyCode} group by loansAccountcode, substr(loans_repaymentday, 1, 2), substr(loans_repaymentday, 4, 2)) group by substr(loans_repaymentday, 1, 2), substr(loans_repaymentday, 4, 2) order by year, month
